projects.title: YOUTUBE CLONE
projects.description: This is a Youtube clone Project. YouTube clone crafted with ReactJS, design using TailwindCSS and Powered by Google Cloud API technology.This platform offers seamless video streaming and robust search functionalities,

projects.title: WEATHER APP
projects.description: Experience real-time weather updates with our intuitive app crafted using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, seamlessly integrated with OpenWeatherAPI for accurate forecasts.

projects.title: TODO  LIST
projects.description: Streamline your tasks with our Todo List, powered by ReactJS and styled with TailwindCSS for a sleek interface. Utilizing Context API, manage your tasks effortlessly with seamless state management.

projects.title: PASSWORD GENERATOR
projects.description: Experience seamless password generation with our innovative tool crafted using React.js and styled with Tailwind CSS. Empowered by Context API, it ensures intuitive user interaction and heightened security
